name: ACRO GYMNASTICS
description: A dynamic style combining strength, flexibility, and acrobatic elements. It emphasizes balance, coordination, and fluid transitions, often blending dance with athletic movements such as flips, jumps, and handstands.

name: AFRO DANCE
description: An energetic dance style rooted in African rhythms and movements, focusing on groove, expression, and powerful footwork.

name: HIP HOP
description: A dynamic street dance style emphasizing rhythm, groove, and self-expression through freestyle and choreography.

name: CONTEMPORARY DANCE
description: A style blending ballet, modern dance, and improvisation with a focus on emotional expression.

name: BALLET
description: A form of performing art that combines dance, music, and theater to tell stories or express emotions through precise choreography.

name: BACHATA
description: A sensual Caribbean dance originating from the Dominican Republic, characterized by closeness, fluid hip movements and a distinct yet simple basic step.

name: TANGO
description: A passionate ballroom dance from Argentina and Uruguay, characterized by close contact between partners, sensuality and improvisation.

name: HIGH HEELS
description: A modern dance style performed in high heels, combining choreography, elegance and sensuality with elements of jazz, hip-hop and even vogue.

name: KIZOMBA FUSION
description: A dance form that combines the basics of traditional kizomba with elements of other styles such as Urban Kiz, Bachata, and even tango, creating a more flexible and artistic form.
